variables.name: projectPath
variables.description: Path to project or code to document

steps.name: Analyze Code
steps.prompt: Analyze the code at {{projectPath}} and create a documentation outline for {{docType}} documentation.

steps.name: Write Documentation
steps.prompt: Write comprehensive {{docType}} documentation in {{format}} format for the code at {{projectPath}}. Make it clear, well-structured, and user-friendly.

steps.name: Review Documentation
steps.prompt: Review the documentation for clarity, accuracy, and completeness.
